Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers explained his decision to bench Khris Middleton following the game against the Spurs on Wednesday night. 'It's just not improving to the place he wants it or we want it, so we just got to monitor,' Rivers said about Middleton's health.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Khris Middleton has missed a bunch of games this season due to his recovery from bilateral ankle surgery.
Taurean Prince has been inserted into the starting lineup in Middleton's place.
Others: The Bucks are still one of the teams to pay attention to when it comes to the NBA title.
Milwaukee might need to make a move or two at the trade deadline to help the team be more consistent on the offensive side of the court.
